backend/main.mo: Defines multiple card game rule types and initializes rulesets for Skyjo, Mille Bornes, Nerts, Flip 7, Phase 10, and Generic Game.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI changes to affected files and components with test IDs and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their responsibilities and behaviors.
frontend/deployment-logs/.gitignore: Ignores all log files in the deployment-logs directory while keeping the directory itself.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Explains prerequisites and steps for local deployment, including automated rebuild instructions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining color variables for light and dark themes along with base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-and-capture-log: Node script that automates build and deployment stages while capturing all logs to timestamped files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with main routes and renders AppLayout plus conditional profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with state handling and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to enter their name and saving the profile via backend actor mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with auto-hiding header, navigation, and mobile menu using navigation state and authentication.
frontend/src/components/rules/GameRulesD: Displays a modal dialog showing game rules and win conditions based on a provided game template.
frontend/src/components/scores/EditRound: Provides a dialog for editing round scores by rendering the appropriate score entry component per game type and managing reset state.
frontend/src/components/scores/Flip7Scor: Implements Flip7 score entry with card selection, modifiers, multipliers, manual scoring, and automatic score calculation.
frontend/src/components/scores/GenericGa: Renders simple numeric score inputs for each player and submits validated scores with stored entry state.
frontend/src/components/scores/MilleBorn: Handles Mille Bornes scoring with distance input, multiple bonus toggles, and score calculation based on game rules.
frontend/src/components/scores/NertsScor: Provides a form for entering Nerts center and tableau card counts per player, computes round scores, and submits validated results.
frontend/src/components/scores/Phase10Sc: Handles Phase 10 per-player score and phase completion input, validates entries, and submits round data with state tracking.
frontend/src/components/scores/RoundsTab: Displays past rounds in a table with player scores and supports editing a selected round.
frontend/src/components/scores/SkyjoScor: Collects numeric Skyjo scores for each player, validates them, and submits the roundâ€™s entry state.
frontend/src/gameTemplates.ts: Defines game templates and a factory function to create typed game configurations with rules, end conditions, and scoring methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoHideHeaderOnSc: Provides a hook that hides or shows a header based on scroll direction and movement threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user profile using the authenticated actor and reports authentication and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameSessions.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating game sessions and rounds via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context and provider, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerProfiles.ts: Defines hooks to fetch all player profiles, create new profiles, and get individual profiles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/scoring.ts: Contains logic for computing player standings and determining end-of-game conditions across multiple game types.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript structures for players, rounds, entry-state per game, and local session metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by rendering React with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/GamePickerScreen.ts: Renders a grid of available games and navigates to the setup screen when a game is selected.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryScreen.tsx: Displays saved game sessions for authenticated users and allows navigating to view or continue a game.
frontend/src/screens/ProfilesScreen.tsx: UI screen for listing, creating, and managing player profiles with authentication checks and table display.
frontend/src/screens/ScoreSheetScreen.ts: Loads and manages a game session, handles rounds and scoring logic, and renders score entry components per game type.
Configures a new game session using saved profiles or quick players, including player selection and game-specific options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current UI update work and feature requests for Phase 10 round submission behavior.
